<h1>Finding Suicide Labs</h1>

If you are looking for <u>**faculty and researchers specializing in the field of suicide and self injury and are able to admit graduate students or RAs**</u>, you're at the right place!  

This list has information about

1. if the researcher **can** accept grad students or RAs, and   
2. if they plan to accept grad student(s) in the **current cycle**.   

It includes researchers in the field of *clinical psychology, psychiatry, neuroscience, social work, public health, etc,* because there are many career paths where you can contribute to suicide research!      


[Open and edit the list in Google Sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1SV8bvFvMJQcHBq3tapgODfbhxloYd-Tmwaegvvj-xU8/edit?usp=sharing) or preview below. Please help maintain this list as we rely on <span style = "color: #FF6999"><u>community efforts</u></span>! 

<iframe src="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQJsK_uW93kUpG4T2R1X4Rhc2XL9y0U99hMX07AwZbw0cNUWettev0ieHU6N6rTHWaUdcDNxXOcO-14/pubhtml?widget=true&amp;headers=false"  width="110%" height="800"></iframe>

***

**Other resources on finding researchers in the suicide and self-injury field:**

* [Psychin'Out](https://www.psychinout.org/) has a list of [PhD Advisor Directory](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1SB-y2AxbDhu5UGZbdh-GQ9DemBVPFfz0sW-pb6LW5j8/edit#gid=663188846) organized by research interests including suicide and self-injury.

* [Dr. Blaire Ehret](https://twitter.com/BlaireEhretPhD) has a [list](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pFkelS0l678qHVlEmLMwFcDo8k_5dP3MNYY5Ju_e_7Y/edit#gid=1078021192) on suicide faculty accepting students in  particular years. 

* [Dr. Abby Ridge-Anderson](https://twitter.com/AbbyAraCUA) has a website on [Resources For Suicide Researchers](https://abbyraphd.github.io/SRSToolbox/resources.html) that involve suicide related networking, organizations, conferences, training, measures, datasets, etc. 

* There are two **free** early-career-friendly *virtual* conferences where you can learn about current research, connect with others, and present your work: [Suicide Research Symposium (SRS)](https://www.suicideresearchsymposium.com/home) and [Youth Suicide Research Consortium (YSRC)](https://www.youthsuicideresearch.org/)
